Description: Body sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style patterned pottery chalice with part of handle; white slip (worn in places); interior: glazed streaky black; exterior: black on handle; part of group of vertical strokes at right of handle in handle zone.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Antikenmuseum, Heidelberg. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: CVA Heidelberg I / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum Heidelberg Universität Band I (p. 14, no. 20, pl. 3)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1175) (phase 2)
